import Theme from '../../components/Theme';
import { Label } from 'bumbag';

# Label

The `<Label>` component renders a `<label>` by default with basic reset styling.

## Import

```jsx
import { Label } from 'bumbag'
```

## Usage

```jsx-live
<Label>Hello world</Label>
<Text.Block>This is me</Text.Block>
```

## Theming

<Theme
  component={Label}
  overrides={[
    'Label.styles.base'
  ]}>
  Hello world
</Theme>
